nodes.text: Myrum Geddis was a man who lived on Prakith.

Geddis was born in about 70 BBY. He founded and ran the Geddis mine on the planet Prakith. During his time there, he sighted some mysterious beings down the mines, who, unknown to him, were the Stereb. Following the formation of the Galactic Empire, control of the mine was transferred over to the Thaarke Corporation and Geddis was resigned to drowning his sorrows in the Mother Lode Cantina, in Prak City.
